docs.lead_paragraph: Officials in some Republican-controlled states want to end public funding for Planned Parenthood or to investigate it in response to videos claiming that it profits from fetal tissue sales.

headline.main: States Move to Cut Funds for Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: States Move to Cut Funds for Provider of Abortions

docs.abstract: Anti-abortion officials in many Republican-controlled states are attempting to block public funding for Planned Parenthood, or to mount investigations into organization; efforts are reaction to controversial video footage of Planned Parenthood officials discussing fetal tissue.
docs.snippet: Officials in some Republican-controlled states want to end public funding for Planned Parenthood or to investigate it in response to videos claiming that it profits from fetal tissue sales.

docs.lead_paragraph: The red panda is loved but vulnerable to habitat loss and climate change.

headline.main: Red Pandas Are Adorable and in Trouble

docs.abstract: Red pandas, adorable mammals beloved by many, are being threatened by deforestation, disease and global warming; species has declined to about 10,000 red pandas that live in dwindling habitats in China and Nepal; researchers are trying to better understand animals' breeding and other habits in hopes of bettering their chances of survival.
docs.snippet: The red panda is loved but vulnerable to habitat loss and climate change.

docs.lead_paragraph: A ballet project targeting girls who live in one of Sao Paulo´s most brutal districts offers hope to children who otherwise face crime, drugs and early pregnancy. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.main: Ballet provides girls an escape from notorious Sao Paulo neighborhood
headline.sub: Ballet provides girls an escape from notorious Sao Paulo neighborhood

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists might have found a new way to tell who's at risk of having a premature baby, by checking the bacterial community that lives in mom's reproductive tract.

headline.main: New Study Links Preterm Birth With Microbes in Mom's Body

docs.lead_paragraph: Planned Parenthood sought an emergency legal injunction on Monday against Florida health officials to block the use of what it says are new and unpublished standards to define pregnancy gestation periods.

headline.main: Planned Parenthood Seeks Injunction Against Florida Health Agency
headline.print_headline: Planned Parenthood Seeks Injunction Against Florida Health Agency

docs.snippet: Planned Parenthood sought an emergency legal injunction on Monday against Florida health officials to block the use of what it says are new and unpublished standards to define pregnancy gestation periods.

docs.lead_paragraph:
HILLMAN--Elsie.

Republican Majority for Choice joins friends across the country in mourning the loss of our dear friend and Board member Elsie Hillman. A founding member of RMC, Elsie was instrumental in creating our mission of protecting women's reproductive rights. For decades she helped lead RMC on Capitol Hill and in state capitols across the country, championing policies that would reduce rates of teen pregnancy, unintended pregnancy and create greater access to preventive health care. She fought to advance the Equal Rights Amendment and to expand the role of women in the political arena. From her early years as a volunteer in Pittsburgh to her time as Republican National Committeewoman from Pennsylvania, Elsie's influence was felt in her community and across the nation. She is best remembered in her own words, "It is possible to see something good and to work for it and even dare to achieve it. Don't be a spectator. You are needed in every corner of the community." RMC National Co-Chairs, Susan Bevan and Candy Straight, Chairs Emeritus, Susan Cullman and Jennifer Stockman & our National Board extend our condolences to Elsie's family as we remember our devoted friend and a unparalleled ally.
docs.snippet: HILLMAN--Elsie. Republican Majority for Choice joins friends across the country in mourning the loss of our dear friend and Board member Elsie Hillman. A founding member of RMC, Elsie was instrumental in creating our mission of protecting women's...
